body:
Please use a number larger than 0, as the default vlog level is 0, meaning that you're actually doing a LOG(INFO) here. If you want to print the log, use environment variable [TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/default/logging.cc#L124) instead.

Also, please fix all occurrence of VLOG(-1) in this PR.
body_html:
Please use a number larger than 0, as the default vlog level is 0, meaning that you're actually doing a LOG(INFO) here. If you want to print the log, use environment variable TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL instead.

Also, please fix all occurrence of VLOG(-1) in this PR.
body_text:
Please use a number larger than 0, as the default vlog level is 0, meaning that you're actually doing a LOG(INFO) here. If you want to print the log, use environment variable TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL instead.
Also, please fix all occurrence of VLOG(-1) in this PR.
